title: WINDOWS XP PRO SP3 BUILD 5512 (RTM) VISTA EDITION Prophet07
description:
WINDOWS XP PRO SP3 BUILD 5512 (RTM) VISTA EDITION Prophet07

Dam! were do I start with the details..This is a FULL custom XP disk, Over 500 files
have been changed to comply with Vista..

TYPE.........: WINDOWS XP PRO SP3 CUSTOM (OPERATING SYSTEM)
VALIDATION...: RAR/SFV
TIME SPENT...: 1 DAY (5 INSTALLS VIA VMWARE)
SIZE OF ISO..: 693 MEGS

(THIS IS A GUI ATTENDED INSTALLER)
==========START OF GUI UPDATED==========
(USER INPUT IS NEEDED)

1) Regional & Language Options
2) Personalize Your Software
3) Computer Name & (ADMIN) password&#039;s
4) Date & Time: Settings
5) Network Settings

(USER INPUT IS NEEDED)
===========END OF GUI UPDATED===========

(PROGRAMS INTERGRATED INTO THE XP INSTALL)

FIREFOX V2.0.0.13
DAEMON TOOL V4.12.3 (Updated New SPDT engine)
GSPOT V2.70a
IMGBURN V2.4.1.0
IE V7.0.5730.13
SPYBOT S&D V1.5.2
UNLOCKER V1.8.5
WMP V11.0.5721.5145
DVD DECRYPTOR V3.5.4.0
VISTA SOUNDS PACK V1.0
WINXP SIDEBAR ADDON (ALKY) V1.1 (Updated)

(PROGRAMS IN THE APPS FOLDER ON ISO)

Movie Maker v2.0 Update (To FIX intergration BUG)
ESET Smart Security v3.0.645.0 (60 Year Key)
Vista Start Menu v2.82
Messenger Live v8.1
Add Licence.REG (DO NOT USE THIS UNLESS VALIDATION FAILS)

(INFO ON MODIFIED FILES)

The $OEM$ folders have been disabled so that F6 can be used in order to load sata
RAID drivers, All modified files have been added to the xp install directly..

(THEME USED AS A VISTA REPLACEMENT)

I decided NOT to use any of the mainstream Vista skin themes as they all used the
official Vista FONT&#039;s & this on XP made it look shit so I modified my own from one
already on the net..

(BUGS FOUND & FIXED)

FIXED a small BUG in Movie Maker install..
FIXED a small BUG in NTOSKRNL file..
FIXED a small BUG in Daemon Tools installer..
FIXED a small BUG in ALKY XP..
FIXED a small BUG in WINNTBBU file..
FIXED a small BUG in the welcome screen..
FIXED a small BUG in user desktop icons..
FIXED a small BUG in multiple users not being able to log in

(FINAL NOTE)

THIS HAS BEEN TESTED FOR ENGLISH / US INSTALLS (NO OTHERS HAVE BEEN TESTED)
